name: Reaction
description: Exercises to improve reaction time and reflexes.

workout_groups.name: Reaction Drills
workout_groups.description: Drills to improve general reaction time.

workouts.name: Basic Reaction Drills
workouts.description: Perform basic reaction drills for 5 minutes.

workouts.name: Intermediate Reaction Drills
workouts.description: Perform intermediate reaction drills for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Advanced Reaction Drills
workouts.description: Perform advanced reaction drills for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Reaction Drills with Sparring
workouts.description: Perform reaction drills with sparring for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Reaction Drills with Sparring and Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Perform reaction drills with sparring and resistance bands for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Weighted Vest Reaction Drills with Sparring
workouts.description: Perform weighted vest reaction drills with sparring for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Weighted Vest Reaction Drills with Sparring and Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Perform weighted vest reaction drills with sparring and resistance bands for 15 minutes.

workouts.description: Perform intermediate gun draw speed drills for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Advanced Gun Draw Speed Drills

workouts.description: Perform gun draw speed drills with sparring for 15 minutes.

workouts.description: Perform gun draw speed drills with sparring and resistance bands for 15 minutes.

workouts.description: Perform weighted vest gun draw speed drills with sparring for 15 minutes.
